dublin_core.dcvalue: GRID technology with initiatives like the GGF will have the potential to allow both competition and interoperability not only among applications and toolkits but also among implementations of key services The pyramid of eHealth interoperability should be achieved from standards in communication and data security storage and processing to the policy initiatives including organizational protocols financing procedures and legal framework The open challenges for GRID use in clinical fields illustrate the potential of the combination of grid technologies with medical routine into a wider interoperable framework
